CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND(
OR( OR( APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Add New Lodgement Point (Same Zone)", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Add or Change Collection Points", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Add Services", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Change Contract Contact Details", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Change of Mail Collection Details", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Change of Organisational / Legal Entity Details", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="Changing Name: Trading Names", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="New or additional account numbers or sub account numbers", APT_SelectedContractAmendRenewCategory__c="T&C Change" ), AND(APT_No_Of_LP_Without_Billing_Account__c= 0, APT_of_Selected_Lodgement_Points__c > 0), INCLUDES (Included_Product_Lines__c , "Priority Product" ), INCLUDES (Included_Product_Lines__c , "StarTrack" ), INCLUDES (Included_Product_Lines__c , "Workforce Verification" )
),
NOT(APT_Is_Create_Contract_Batch_Job_Running__c),
APT_Ratecards_Created__c,
NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated")), NOT(ISBLANK(Included_Product_Lines__c)) ),
HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_CreateContractValidation?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Green", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"),
IF (AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Terminated")),NOT(ISBLANK(Included_Product_Lines__c))), HYPERLINK("/apex/APT_ManageContractLodgementPoint?agId="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create_Red", "Create Contract Documents (One Click)"),"_self"), NULL)
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Generate/Create all suggested contract documents for this Contract with One Click. Please make sure you have Lodgement Point with Billing Account before using this functionality.
CustomField.label: Create Contracts
